name: LSI Industries Inc.
description: LSI Industries Inc. is a leading provider of lighting and graphics solutions, primarily serving the commercial and industrial sectors. Founded in 1976 and headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, LSI specializes in the design, manufacturing, and distribution of high-quality LED lighting products and marketing solutions. The company emphasizes innovation and sustainability, focusing on energy-efficient lighting solutions that help reduce operational costs and environmental impact. LSI's product offerings include outdoor and indoor lighting fixtures, architectural lighting, and digital signage solutions. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, LSI supports a diverse range of applications, including retail, hospitality, education, and transportation. The company utilizes advanced technology and engineering expertise to deliver customized solutions that meet the evolving needs of its clients. LSI Industries is dedicated to enhancing the user experience through effective lighting and signage, striving to create safe and inviting environments. The company's mission is to be the preferred supplier of innovative lighting and graphic solutions by fostering long-term relationships with customers and providing exceptional service.
